sentences.sentence: Cecil Fridjohn, my father, came from an impecunious Irish Jewish family.
sentences.translation: 赛斯尔·弗雷德约翰，我的父亲，来自于一个贫穷的爱尔兰犹太家庭。

sentences.sentence: Cecil Fridjohn, my father, came from an impecunious Irish Jewish family.
sentences.translation: 塞西尔·弗雷特，我的父亲，来自贫穷的爱尔兰的犹太家庭。

sentences.sentence: They are independent, impecunious and able to tolerate all degrees of discomfort.
sentences.translation: 他们独立自主的，囊中羞涩的，并且能够忍受各种不便。
